ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They removed the skill from the trainer until it gets implemented.  Training points devoted to the skill won t be lost, and it should be implemented within
ygData.messageBody:
rfunk@... wrote:

> From: rfunk@...
>
> Ok, not entirely on topic but does anyone know how you achieve
> specialization once you hit 20th level? I tried the trainer but nothing on
> specialization even thought it was listed as a skill gained at 20th earlier
> in the game. Does it work? Thanks.
>
> -- Elidain 20th Level Erudite Wizard on Veeshan
>
>

They removed the skill from the trainer until it gets implemented. Training points devoted to the skill won't be lost, and it should be implemented within a couple of weeks.
